issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: yarn rmadmin commands fail in secure cluster

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: It belongs to the client package and not the RM clearly.
fields.summary: Move RMAdmin tool to the client package

comments.body:
+1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12546436/YARN-127-20120924.txt
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    +1 tests included.  The patch appears to include 2 new or modified test files.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 eclipse:eclipse.  The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

    +1 findbugs.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-api hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-client hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-common hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-server/hadoop-yarn-server-resourcemanager.

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-YARN-Build/49//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-YARN-Build/49//console

This message is automatically generated.

Couple of comments.
 - Should AdminSecurityInfo move yarn-common ?
 - RMAdminProtocolPB.java sets the protocol name to  "org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.api.RMAdminProtocolPB". The nodemanager part doesn't make a lot of sense. This exists in the current code as well - so this could be fixed in a separate jira. In fact all Yarn protocols are named *PB (ClientRMProtocolPB, RMAdminProtocolPB, etc). The PB bit isn't required.

Tx for the review Sid.

Updated patch moving AdminSecurityInfo.

Also needed to fix bin/yarn :)

Let's move the protocol names issue to another ticket.

Just committed this to trunk and branch-2.

Thanks for the review, Sid.
